description: We value the intellectual property rights of others and expect our Users to do the same. The Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) has established a process for dealing with claims of copyright infringement. If you own the copyright or have rights on behalf of the copyright owner and would like to report a claim that a third party is infringing on the material, please submit a DMCA report on our Contact page and we will take appropriate action
item1: A description of the copyrighted work you believe is being infringed
item2: A description of the material you believe is infringing and you want to remove or the access you want to disable, and the URL or other location of that material
item3: Your name, title (if agent), address, phone number and email address
item4: A statement that you agree to the authority
desc_item4: I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material I am complaining about is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law (e.g. fair use)
item5: A statement that you did not perjure
desc_item5: The information in this notice is accurate and, under penalty of perjury, I am the owner, or authorized to act on behalf of the owner, of the copyright or proprietary right that is allegedly infringed
item6: Electronic or physical signature of the copyright owner or someone authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner
heading3: Your DMCA takedown request must be emailed
description_heading3: We will then review your DMCA request and take appropriate action, including removing the content from the site
